entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets late in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 then east 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries and ice pellets changing to rain showers and flurries in the evening then to flurries after midnight. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
